Determine if Plumber object

Source: R/pr.R
is_plumber.Rd

Determine if Plumber object

is_plumber(pr)

Arguments

pr

Hopefully a Plumber object

Value

Logical value if pr inherits from Plumber

Examples

is_plumber(Plumber$new()) # TRUE

#> [1] TRUE
is_plumber(list()) # FALSE

#> [1] FALSE
